about_the_game:
In the Psionic Awake, You can call company explore the wildland; By the way, you also provoking the powerful demon king. At night, the demon army that you played with will get more and more angry on their bed, they will attack your fortress to Release their anger!

Double major with waifu Shot million bullets

  • We currently has four beautiful girl; they can use both magic and physical way to fight. We will add more waifu in the future!
  • Our game use the latest DOTS code, even the old, low spec; outdated computer can still maintain stable frame rates, no matter how many demons in the screen！Amazing！

Identify your bullet Explore the wildland

  • You can upgrade your skills by killing demons and collecting resources in the wildland, and clearing nests can also get treasure. Any combination of skills can be stacked, and you can design the shape of the bullet freely.

Multiple way to play Summon the dragon

  • In the planet Gaia, you can make friends by visiting the tavern. You can bribe your friends to join you in dangerous adventures.。
  • In the cute Pony planet, you can ride on magical ponies and become unstoppable in battles by accessing the "stables".
  • You can summon the "Workshop Guardian" by using the "Invention Workshop" in the "Awaken" section.
  • You can also choose "Wishing Come True" to collect all seven Dragon Balls and make a wish.

Challenge the demon king Fight against demon army

  • On the perilous map, there is also the "Demon King Challenge" feature, which allows you to defeat the Demon King and get precious treasure. Although that will be extremely hard, but the peerless beauty will never shrink from the challenge!
  • At night, a strong soldier and defensive structures are essential in a battleground. The fortress feature in the game allows you to build and fortify your defenses, making it possible to face and even conquer a massive enemy army. With this feature, you can strategize and protect yourself even in the darkest hours of the night.

Fight with pony Kill them all

  • This game is far from lonely! You can count on the help of magical ponies and stallions to help battle and smash your opponents. Don't forget about the beloved WULI KUN horse, who is also available to ride and assist you in your battles. With so much support and company, you never have to venture into battle alone!
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD

Discord:


About the Game

In the Psionic Awake, You can call company explore the wildland; By the way, you also provoking the powerful demon king. At night, the demon army that you played with will get more and more angry on their bed, they will attack your fortress to Release their anger!

Double major with waifu Shot million bullets

  • We currently has four beautiful girl; they can use both magic and physical way to fight. We will add more waifu in the future!
  • Our game use the latest DOTS code, even the old, low spec; outdated computer can still maintain stable frame rates, no matter how many demons in the screen！Amazing！

Identify your bullet Explore the wildland

  • You can upgrade your skills by killing demons and collecting resources in the wildland, and clearing nests can also get treasure. Any combination of skills can be stacked, and you can design the shape of the bullet freely.

Multiple way to play Summon the dragon

  • In the planet Gaia, you can make friends by visiting the tavern. You can bribe your friends to join you in dangerous adventures.。
  • In the cute Pony planet, you can ride on magical ponies and become unstoppable in battles by accessing the "stables".
  • You can summon the "Workshop Guardian" by using the "Invention Workshop" in the "Awaken" section.
  • You can also choose "Wishing Come True" to collect all seven Dragon Balls and make a wish.

Challenge the demon king Fight against demon army

  • On the perilous map, there is also the "Demon King Challenge" feature, which allows you to defeat the Demon King and get precious treasure. Although that will be extremely hard, but the peerless beauty will never shrink from the challenge!
  • At night, a strong soldier and defensive structures are essential in a battleground. The fortress feature in the game allows you to build and fortify your defenses, making it possible to face and even conquer a massive enemy army. With this feature, you can strategize and protect yourself even in the darkest hours of the night.

Fight with pony Kill them all

  • This game is far from lonely! You can count on the help of magical ponies and stallions to help battle and smash your opponents. Don't forget about the beloved WULI KUN horse, who is also available to ride and assist you in your battles. With so much support and company, you never have to venture into battle alone!
name: Psionic Awake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Psionic Awake is a Roguelike game . Collect resources during the day and defend against monsters at night. It emphasizes any combination of weapons, talents, treasures and partners.
